```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(lme4)
library(Matrix)
```

```{r}
dt1<-read_excel("2.xlsx")
view(dt1)
```

```{r}
dt <- dt1 %>%
  filter(!(Ans == "space" | Yesorno == 0) & RT>=0.15 & RT<= 0.9)%>%
mutate(Numbersize = ifelse(stimuli %in% c(1,2),"lessthan5","morethan5"))
view(dt)
```
```{r}
dt$Ans <- factor(dt$Ans)
dt$Numbersize <- factor(dt$Numbersizeï¼Œref= lessthan5)
Model <-lm(RT ~ Numbersize * Ans, data = dt)
summary(Model)
anova(Model)
```


```{r}
twoway<-aov(RT~stimuli + Ans, data= dt)
summary(aov(RT~stimuli + Ans, data= dt))

```

```{r}
model<-aov(RT ~ Ans * Numbersize,data=dt)
summary(model)
```
